title: Does anyone even care to do Raptor and Krugs?
body:
I hate doing these 2 useless camps since they take forever and especially Raptor that takes your hp down to 20-30% unless you have a champion that life steal or has a AoE.

They take forever for something so useless for reasons I don't even get why. I know i miss farm and EXP but dear fk Raptor does to much damage for champions who has no life steal or shield.

replies.body: {{champion:35}} main but I clear the whole thing. I understand a lot of Shaco mains skip chickens though.

Fuck knows why, Q over wall, W in little chikkun, backstab > smite > E big chooker  and then try to backstab little chooker.

They turn really fast so they always face you, but you can still backstab them, just like spy facestab.

I never have a problem with them, and I definitely appreciate that extra gold. Strong jungle pathing means one kill and I'm pretty fed.

I usually hold smite for a couple seconds to get the most out of its heal, usually can walk away from chickens pretty healthy.
Yeah, full clear + 1 kill is Tiamats on your first back.

Karthus Jungle does.


Nah Shaco does alright on them provided he plays it right.. just like any camp I guess.
A lot Junglers skip Chickens, but Krugs give too much EXP to skip.

The Krugs are apart of my clear, but the raptors I skip. Krugs, you just have to kite. Focus on the medium size on than the little ones, than the largest one. That is the only on the smite buff works on anyway.
I wish I could smite the medium ones, they are nasty motherfuckers.

You can, you jut won't get health back. It depends on your jungler. I use aoe junglers so I always attack both but I must finish the smaller ones first. That's all. Single target, smaller. No question.

I'm a bad jungler, BUT I take my 3 early camps and usually go gank afterwards. Then probably back to base and redo my camps. I almost never take grump or raptors to be honest. But again I'm not really sure of what im doing when jungling

Yeah this new jungle great for AOE junglers, I always do then with Rengar but not unless I have smite, not to mention if I play mid, the other jungler usually doesn't take them so I kill them if I get a chance, the xp is really nice to steal

Theirs actually a smart strat going around to start raptors and then take red buff, (for champs who have decent wave clear lvl 1), because raptors gives bonus experience and you can go for a lvl 3 gank quick
i fucking despise krugs man.. but raptors are fine for me..

honestly no, after i get my leash, if im in blue side i finish that side i go red then do a semi-gank.  if i start red side i go immediately to blue finish that side and then gank, maby counter jgl if i see them doing raptors.  hell, i even let my midlaner take raptars on occasion if they can clear it in 1 rotation.  i dont even try farming them til after i have my knife
{{champion:32}} can do Raps/Krugs just fine with his amazing AOE. Other junglers usually just skip those camps for a few levels.
